title: Dear Based Rito
body:
The Canadian dollar is no longer worth less than its weight in dirt and it's not going to go down in value any time soon due The Bank of Canada deciding to rob the country of all its remaining money and dignity. The Canadian dollar is only going to go up from here.

The current system gives 107 RP per dollar by purchasing $50 at a time. $50 USD converted to CAD makes the $50 USD purchase option worth more like 114 RP per dollar.

I know there is an option to buy in USD, but due to the way a lot (all?) of credit card companies work here they take a cut when you convert currency. So we of the frozen north would appreciate it if you stopped trying to rob our dead bodies.

Sincerely,
Your friend, Cyrus

replies.body: Yea that does suck a bit, but sadly we don't have much to do with currency differences =\ . Hit up our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we might be able to help you figure something out!
